## treedepth
* graphclasses.org: [treedepth](https://www.graphclasses.org/classes/par_18.html)
* [â†—](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tree-depth) The tree-depth of a graph $G$ may be defined as the minimum height of a forest $F$ with the property that every edge of $G$ connects a pair of nodes that have an ancestor-descendant relationship to each other in $F$.
